Glad to see people are enjoying this already, not even a whole afternoon after I posted it. From now on I'll be sure to post other awesome finds if they don't already have torrents.

Making an account and logging in seems to fix it, and you don't get limited by it being free either, at least it seems that way so far.

Straight forward. 

1) Run the install .exe
2) Copy Crack to Install Directory.
3) Start program and enjoy.

I do not know if this may cause problems or not but the last option of step 1 (The Install) ask if you wish to Launch Xsplit. I unticked that option and went straight to step 2.

_

I have tested this via Local Recording and the Watermark was gone. (Which was my reason for seeking a crack version.)

@Xsplit Software Devs - I love your software, however I am unable to afford your subscription cost.
